name: Be Eel
description:
A short thing about being an eel in the Thames river.
Didn't really have time to add the gameplay we had in mind.
But you can swim around and chomp on some fish ^^

Credits

Made in 2 days for Game Dev London Summer Jam - 2020.

@heyits5am - Design + Programming
@tinyruin - 3D Art
@LuciHolland - Music & SFX
